name: 陳岡伯
objective:
本課程提供學生及職前專業人士必備之英語文語言技巧，強調人文專業領域之英文溝通能力之訓練。課程內容依學院專業內容區分並整合英語文之聽說讀寫之能力為未來全球化移動及以英語專業溝通人才培育為目標。
This course aims to provide pre-service cultural business students/professionals with the adequate skills of the English language and communicative competence to facilitate their current academic and future career pursuits. 

The course will be arranged thematically to approach important fields and topics in humanities including art, music, philosophy, literature, history, and popular culture (including films and TV series). The instructor will lecture on one selected article (distributed to students a week in advance) and conduct in-class discussion each week.
schedule:
Week 1-2: Introduction to the course: what is humanities? 

Week 3-5: Art

Week 6-8: Music

Week 9: Mid-term exam

Week 10-12: Literature

Week 13-15: History

Week 16-17: Films and TV dramas

Week 18: Final exam
scorePolicy:
Attendance and participation: 20%
Mid-term exam: 20%
Oral presentation: 20%
Joint exam: 20%
Final exam: 20%
materials: Selected articles and other reading materials will be decided and distributed to students in class.
